about.title: About Us
about.content1: Welcome to our Marathon Event Photo platform.
about.content2: We are dedicated to capturing and sharing the most memorable moments of your running journey.
about.content3: Our team of professional photographers ensures that every stride, every smile, and every finish line crossing is immortalized.
